column4: a 34 year old Indian was detained at Promroth pagoda
column5: where he had been staying.------Police questioned the man
column6: who arrived in Cambodia on November 15
column8: near Poipet. He then went to live in Siem Reap
column9: and along the way lost his passport.------He was later sent to Siem Reap ------Immigration------ Department Removal Center for legal proceedings.------http://media.gdlf.gov.kh/archives/119200
